name: Caterpillar Complete
description:
Hi all! This is my submission for Brackeys Gamejam 2021.1.

You're a caterpillar and you have to find all your parts. Every part gives you strength and speed. Stronger together! This game can be played in a browser, but for a better experience, I invite you to download the project.

All assets including scripts, objects, sounds, etc, will be available for free via my  Youtube channel. Enjoy the game :D

CONTROLS

W SMoveMouseLookSpacebarJumpESCPause
